mapper.insert: insert into member(id, pwd, email, age) values(#{id}, #{pwd}, #{email}, #{age})
mapper.select: select * from member where id=#{id} and pwd=#{pwd}
mapper.update: update member set lastlogin = now() where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from member order by regdate
mapper.update: update member set pwd=#{pwd}, email=#{email}, age=#{age} where id=#{id}
